Text: Hi I downloaded this video and it will not play on any of the systems I have. WMP ; Real Player ; Ivenco ; Mad Monkey ; Fly Player even when .flv added....Cheers

The video plays fine.  Media Player Classic recognises it and plays it.  It starts with Lee's son talking to Lee about... girl stuff, then goes into the song with a choir of kids joining Lee in the studio.  Ident dates it at April 1972.  Colour film, the typical great quality we've come to expect from the Swedish TV film archives.
